title: 105_hr420
content: Enterprise Capital Formation Act of 1997 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from 50 to 75 percent the exclusion from gain for a taxpayer resulting from the sale or exchange of qualified small business stock held more than three years. Exempts such exclusion from alternative minimum tax provisions. Doubles the aggregate gross assets a business may have and still be considered a qualified small business. Provides for the nontaxable rollover of gain from qualified small business stock to another small business stock.
